sub_title: AI practitioner, big data expert, MLOps engineer, speaker and author. Independent consultant at Aizonic.
summary: I am a technology leader specialized in AI and big data, with a strong history in application development and architecture. In my work, I try to find creative and pragmatic solutions for customers. I like to motivate people, and encourage colleagues to strive for the best. I am a regular speaker at conferences and meetups. Recently I co-authored the books 'The Artificial Intelligence Infrastructure Workshop' (Packt) and '97 Things Every Data Engineer Should Know' (O'Reilly).

authors.headline: AI practitioner, big data expert, MLOps engineer, speaker and author. Independent consultant at Aizonic.

profile_positions.description: Building a global AI/ML system, including architectural patterns, infrastructure, CI/CD, etc.
profile_positions.title: Lead ML Engineer

profile_positions.description: Aizonic provides consultancy in big data and AI. Aizonic is part of the Dutch AI Coalition (NLAIC).
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Building smart marketplace ad technology that fully automates marketing campaigns for the recruitment and staffing industry - part of DPG Media.
profile_positions.title: Data Architect

profile_positions.description: Wayfair is one of the world’s largest online destinations for the home, and one of the largest retails platforms. I'm helping to improve customer satisfaction by building machine learning models for the supply chain, e.g. to forecast delivery times. Tech stack: Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Kafka, Airflow, Aerospike, Python.
profile_positions.title: Lead ML Engineer

profile_positions.description: Randstad is taking recruitment to the next level with AI. I am working on the core business of the company to improve candidate-vacancy matching with state-of-the-art technology and (NLP) machine learning models. Tech stack: AWS, Kafka, Spark, ElasticSearch, Airflow, Scala, Python.
profile_positions.title: Lead Data/ML Engineer

profile_positions.description: Enabling real-time data science for the largest retailer in The Netherlands. Gathering, storing and processing 5TB of data per day. Tech stack: Flink, Kafka, Kubernetes, Google BigQuery.
profile_positions.title: Lead Data Engineer

profile_positions.description: Working on advanced analytics for the food industry in one of the most ambitious and innovative programs for Rabobank, Azure stack.
profile_positions.title: Technology Lead

profile_positions.description: Leading the technical implementation of a global innovation project at the ING Labs Innovation Office that will disrupt the mortgage market across Europe. Based on PSD2 data, machine learning algorithms create a customer profile and can digitally issue a pre-approved mortgage in minutes, instead of manually handling the paperwork. Working with Amazon AWS, Scala, Python, Polymer.
profile_positions.title: Technology Lead

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for the IT delivery and people management of the Fast Data chapter. In 2013, I started at the Mortgages department and contributed to several key projects for improving the client satisfaction, data quality and operational status of the IT landscape. From 2015, I work in the Analytics department. The teams I managed developed the central data lake of ING Netherlands, where all data is collected and published with big data technologies. Since 2016 I am leading the 'Fast Data' chapter in the, where we build realtime predictive APIs based on data from the data lake.
profile_positions.title: IT Chapter Lead

profile_positions.description: As manager of the Applications department I was responsible for all delivery activities regarding applications consultancy, development, maintenance, and testing of DXC (fka CSC) Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Application Architect, I worked for several (inter)national customers on diverse projects. Most work I performed was consultancy as application architect using Microsoft technology. Some clients I worked for are Royal Mail, Wolters Kluwer, Raad voor de rechtspraak, Urenco, and BHP Billiton.

I also was teamlead for a team of 20 application developers. This was a parttime role in which I was responsible for the placement of individuals on projects, their education, and evaluation of performance.
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description: I worked as senior software developer for Accenture Technology Solutions and Avanade. Clients I worked for include Nationale Nederlanden and A&O Services.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: I volunteer as a coach for young children who learn to program using the MIT Scratch tool.
I teach chess to two groups of children in the age range 6-10
